title: You’ve Unlocked a New Gift
headline: You’ve Unlocked a New Gift
subtitle: Pump Shotgun Tint
content:
Thank you for completing all 6 First Dose missions on Hard difficulty between January 12 and February 8. Your gift of the Dildodude Pump Shotgun tint will be available before February 17. Visit any Ammu-Nation, Armory, or Weapon Workshop to equip the Shotgun tint.

Stay tuned to the Rockstar Newswire for more limited-time events coming soon.
